org.supercsv.io
Interface ITokenizer

All Known Implementing Classes:
Tokenizer
public interface ITokenizer

The tokenizer is an internal mechanism to the csv parser

Author:
Kasper B. Graversen

Method Summary
 void close()
          Close the underlying stream
 int getLineNumber()
           
 boolean readStringList(List<String> result)
          Read a csv line into the list result (can span multiple lines in the file) The result list is cleared as the first thing in the method
 

Method Detail

close

void close()
           throws IOException
Close the underlying stream

Throws:
IOException - when raised by operating on the underlying stream

getLineNumber

int getLineNumber()

readStringList

boolean readStringList(List<String> result)
                       throws IOException,
                              SuperCSVException
Read a csv line into the list result (can span multiple lines in the file) The result list is cleared as the first thing in the method

Parameters:
result - the result of the operation
Returns:
true if something was read. and false if EOF
Throws:
IOException - when an io-error occurs
SuperCSVException - on errors in parsing the input
Since:
1.0
